name: Lakshmi Rao
summary: Dedicated Junior Data Analyst with a passion for leveraging data to improve healthcare outcomes. Skilled in R programming, data visualization, and statistical analysis.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Developed predictive models to optimize patient care pathways, resulting in a 15% increase in treatment efficiency.

experience.title: Health Data Intern
experience.description: Analyzed patient health records to identify trends, leading to actionable insights for preventive healthcare strategies.

projects.name: Patient Readmission Prediction
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to predict patient readmission rates, reducing readmission by 10% using R and ggplot2.

projects.name: Population Health Analysis
projects.description: Conducted in-depth analysis of population health trends using Tableau, presenting actionable recommendations for targeted interventions.
